name: Sky Fight
description:
Sky fight is a game where you and your friend fight each other with planes. You can pick between 4 different planes and 4 different weather. Each plane has 4 unique abilities. 

CONTROLS

All controls and abilities are explained in the game. But anyways here are the controls:


PLAYER 1

Turn up with W and down with S
slow down with A and speed up with D
Abilities are C, V, B and N.

PLAYER 2

Turn up with UP ARROW and down with DOWN ARROW
slow down with LEFT ARROW and speed up with RIGHT ARROW
Abilities are U, I, O and P.

PLANES & WEATHER

For now there are 4 planes and 4 weather types, but I might add some later, it all depends on how many players will suggest more.

THANK YOU FOR CHECKING MY GAME AND PLEASE SUPPORT ME BY WHATCHING MY VIDEO HOW THE GAME WAS MADE.
